title.value: SUNDAE Checklist for evaluation studies of patient decision aids
title.justification: The title 'SUNDAE Checklist for evaluation studies of patient decision aids' clearly identifies the main purpose of the document, which is to provide a checklist for evaluating patient decision aids.
title.quote: SUNDAE Checklist for evaluation studies of patient decision aids

extractions.description: This paper provides a checklist (SUNDAE Checklist) to guide the evaluation of patient decision aids, focusing on various aspects such as development process, components, usage fidelity, and outcome measures.

type.justification: The paper provides a theoretical framework (the SUNDAE checklist) for evaluating patient decision aids, rather than presenting new experimental data.
type.quote: Use the term patient decision aid in the abstract to identify the intervention evaluated and, if possible, in the title.

name.justification: The primary focus of the paper is on the evaluation of patient decision aids, which are tools to assist in healthcare decision making.
name.quote: Describe the decision that is the focus of the patient decision aid.

name.justification: The entire checklist is centered around the evaluation of patient decision aids, marking it as a subfield within healthcare decision making.
name.quote: Describe the purpose of the evaluation study with respect to the patient decision aid.
